title: Radiographic Study of Transcrestal Sinus Floor Elevation Using Osseodensification Technique with Graft Material: A Non-randomized Pilot Clinical Trial
content: The study aimed to evaluate implant success and bone height variations after transcrestal sinus floor elevation (tSFE) using the osseodensification technique (OD) combined with beta-tricalcium phosphate (Î²-TCP), as bone graft material and simultaneous implant placement. Thirteen patients requiring the placement of one implant in the upper posterior maxilla, with a residual bone height of
